Name: Weird Japan
About the game: Weird Japan is a role-playing game in which the main character returns from the war with the Crusaders.During the war, the world has changed and he will have to take one of the sides.Explore a fantasy alternative medieval Japan in which samurai and other representatives of ancient Japan live in the same world with fantastic creatures.From intelligent animals to vampires.Will you be able to keep the world stable or will darkness cover it? Key Features : - Open world.You can go wherever you want. - Non-linear history.Quests that can be completed in different ways. - Multiple endings.Your actions will affect the end of the game.
